  • Class
    Description
    NotifyCardPlayed
    This class represents a notification message that is sent when a card is played.
    NotifyCardState
    This class represents a notification message that is sent to update the state of the cards in the game.
    NotifyChosenObjective
    This class represents a notification message that is sent when an objective is chosen.
    NotifyChosenStarter
    This class represents a notification message that is sent when a starter card is chosen.
    NotifyColorsAssignment
    This class represents a notification message that is sent to assign colors to players.
    NotifyDraw
    This class represents a notification message that is sent when a player draws a card.
    NotifyDraw.DrawType
    Enum representing the types of draws.
    NotifyEndMatch
    This class represents a notification message that is sent at the end of a match.
    NotifyGlobalObjectives
    This class represents a notification message that is sent to update the global objectives.
    NotifyLastRound
    This class represents a notification message that is sent to indicate the last round of the game.
    NotifyMatchStarted
    This class represents a notification message that is sent when a match has started.
    NotifyMessage
    Abstract class representing a notification message.
    NotifyPlayerHand
    This class represents a notification message that is sent to update a player's hand and back hands.
    NotifySetUpFinished
    This class represents a notification message that is sent when the game setup has finished.
    NotifyStarterCards
    This class represents a notification message that is sent to inform players about the starter cards chosen by each player.
    NotifyToChooseObjective
    This class represents a notification message that is sent to prompt a player to choose between two objectives.
    NotifyToChooseStarter
    This class represents a notification message that is sent to prompt a player to choose a starter card.
    NotifyTurn
    This class represents a notification message that is sent to inform a player about their turn.
    NotifyType
    Enum defining different types of notification messages.
